synopsis: Luluco aims to live a normal life in the abnormal town of Ogikubo, a space immigration zone where humans and aliens coexist, but her normal life comes crashing down with a bang one morning.
Things get stranger for Luluco, as the arrival of a transfer student and a new partner shake things up even further.
The newly formed team of Luluco and Nova head to school to look for Save the World, the alien circulating the Blackhole app.
A meteorite comes hurtling towards Ogikubo, and only the Space Patrol trio can prevent Armageddon.
Lalaco Godspeed, Luluco's mother and Space Pirate Captain, unveils her grand plan... and it involves Ogikubo?!
Space Pirate Lalaco Godspeed is on the rampage, and only one man can stop her.
The Space Patrol gang have to find Ogikubo quickly, or they'll have nowhere to go home to! That's when they stumble upon a rather strange planet...
Luluco and gang stumble upon a rather magical planet during their quest to find Ogikubo.
Luluco wants relationship advice, and who better to turn to than a detective agency?
The shocking truth comes to light in truly heart-breaking fashion.
Luluco finds herself dead and in Hell, where she runs into a man who has been there, done that.
Back to life, Luluco decides confront to Nova once and for all.
